items.sentence: What happened to the benches that they used to have at bus stops?
When I was a child, my mother made me eat everything on my plate.
When did Tom tell you that he and Mary were going to get married?
There\'s a good chance that Tom doesn\'t know what Mary has done.
There\'s not a second that goes by that I don\'t think about you.
Tom needed to decide whether he would continue working in Boston.
Tom never expected that Mary would agree to take care of his dog.
Tom never thought Mary would ever actually graduate from college.
Tom popped into the supermarket on his way home to buy some milk.
Tom pretended not to understand what Mary was trying to tell him.
